workDetails.title: Responsibilities
list: ▸ Create new pages, integrate APIs and add functionalities using Struts framework, Java and Javascript.
▸ Created REST API endpoints using Spring Boot to implement required client functionality.
▸ Train and provide K.T. to junior devs and ensure their project readiness.

workDetails.title: Projects
list: ▸ TCS BaNCS: A banking product implemented for OP Financial Group (client).
▸ DevTools: A multi functional tool implemented to streamline manual tasks.

workDetails.title: Achievements
list: ▸ Received 'Star of the Month' for completing mutilple complex user stories in the absence of a senior resource.
▸ Cleared TCS's Wings exam on MERN Stack and received a Hi-Talent tag.

▸ Single-handedly designed and implemented a tool with multiple functionality which streamlined several multi-step manual processes into a single-click solution, significantly enhancing workflow efficiency of developers and testers.
